## Keys pickup


Kindly pick up the keys at the Golden Mile gate. We will have notified them of your intended arrival.

* Here is the Google maps link: https://maps.app.goo.gl/357cA4x2VbRyN9pk6

When you leave, please put the alarm on and drop the keys off at the security gate.
